title: That Kiss In The Rain
description: “If we women are really weak then why do they need to discharge so many sperms for one ovum?” Pallavi, 27, single, Kingfisher Airlines. “Half the headaches in a man's life involve a woman and half the heartaches in a woman's life are because of a man.” Swadha, 24, single, Nh Consultants Pvt.Ltd. And then they met him. . ..exactly when they shouldn't have.
author: Novoneel Chakraborty
